name: Dungeon Blockers
description:
Dungeon Blockers

You play as a boy named Rehn, who has heard about rumors about treasure that lies beneath a dungeon close by. One day, he decides to traverse the dungeon in order to find the treasure. Your job is to help him solve the puzzles in each room, and the deeper you go inside the dungeon, the bigger and harder it will be to solve them. Can you help Rehn reach the treasure? Find out in Dungeon Blockers!

Credits

-Programming done by Nicholas Martinez (@QUICKALAS529 )

-Music done by @ModalModule

-Main Art done by @Lord_404

-This game was made in 10 days for the Game Boy Jam! :D
